front.title: Recommendation for key-derivation methods in key-establishment schemes

author.organization: Information Technology Laboratory (National Institute of Standards and Technology)

front.abstract: This Recommendation specifies techniques for the derivation of keying material from a shared secret established during a key-establishment scheme defined in NIST Special Publications 800-56A or 800-56B.

seriesInfo.name: NIST special publication; NIST special pub; NIST SP
